---
title: "Size checks"
output: html_notebook
---

# Predators
```{r}
pred_size_check <- preds %>% 
  select(Binomial, Length_mm) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Length_mm)) %>% 
  group_by(Binomial) %>% 
  summarise(`Mean size (mm)` = mean(Length_mm), `Max size (mm)` = max(Length_mm), `Min size (mm)` = min(Length_mm)) %>% 
  mutate(Size_range = `Max size (mm)`-`Min size (mm)`,
         `Size diff %` = 100*`Size_range`/`Mean size (mm)`)
```
